comments.body: We'll want to enable customizing the shape to support the Google Material picker

Yup. My thought was to update the DialogTheme to match the rest of the current theme patterns, in which case we could update the defaults and then we wouldn't need to hard code those here (or just have these be fall backs when the DialogTheme didn't override them).

        borderRadius: BorderRadius.all(Radius.circular(4.0))
      ),

comments.body: It would be nice to add an interactive sample here sometime (not in this PR).
